item.description:
[ Facebook event ]

ORDER TICKETS ONLINE (before they sell out!):  http://cnht.org/picnic2011​.php

The 'first straw poll of the season' will be held by the Coalition of New Hampshire Taxpayers at their Annual Taxpayer Reunion Picnic.

Support Ron Paul, the taxpayer's best friend, and let those watching know that New Hampshire is Ron Paul territory!

Traditionally the first straw poll of the season, it is a 'must attend'! Good friends, good politics, and lots of food to be had! Price is $15 for all you can eat. Talk show host Mike Ball will serve as emcee!
item.name: Vote for Ron at "first straw poll of the season" - CNHT Annual Picnic
